entry.title: ðŸŽ“ Mojo Learning Labs
entry.content:
An online assignment-setting tool for school teachers. Students are invited via email and can join classes that are available for their year group at their school. Teachers can create classes as required and set assignments consisting of various questions (including an image) and answer choices. Students receive grades upon assignment submission and teachers obtain a markbook with student performance and average scores.

Built using Rails, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and PostgreSQL.

entry.title: ðŸš² Flying Wheels
entry.content:
Flying Wheels is a marketplace for renting bikes. List bikes online and approve/reject booking requests.

Built using Rails, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and PostgreSQL.
